title: Interactive FHIR & Health Data Skills
description: Upgrade the existing azure-fhir-developer and azure-health-data-services skills from reference-only to interactive MCP-backed skills. Add commands like validate_resource, search_patients, get_patient_conditions to azure-fhir-developer. Add DICOM/MedTech tool wrappers to azure-health-data-services. Makes both skills demo-ready instead of documentation-only.

title: Prior Auth workflow: audit trail + RAG context
description: Integrate audit event recording at each phase of prior_auth.py. Add Phase 0 RAG retrieval for payer policies. Update agent instructions for Coverage/Synthesis agents.

title: Patient 360 Skill - All 6 MCPs
description: New Copilot skill exercising all 6 MCP servers in a single patient intelligence workflow. Given a patient ID, retrieves conditions/medications/observations (FHIR), validates diagnoses (ICD-10), checks coverage (CMS), verifies providers (NPI), searches treatment literature (PubMed), and finds matching trials (Clinical Trials). Best showcase of the full MCP suite.

title: Cosmos DB Bicep: vector/fulltext containers + role assignments
description: Extend dependent-resources.bicep with documents (vector+FT), audit-trail, agent-memory containers. Update main.bicep with cosmosDbEndpoint env var pass-through and Cosmos DB Data Contributor role for function apps.

title: Deployment wiring: APIM + azure.yaml for cosmos-rag
description: Add cosmos-rag to APIM passthrough module, azure.yaml service mapping, function-apps.bicep mcpServers array, and Makefile/local-test scripts.

title: MCP server: cosmos-rag function app
description: New MCP server under src/mcp-servers/cosmos-rag/ with tools: index_document, hybrid_search, vector_search, record_audit_event, get_audit_trail, get_session_history. Azure Function with azure-cosmos SDK.

title: Agent tooling: cosmos-rag in MCPToolKit + config
description: Add cosmos_rag endpoint to config.py, create_cosmos_rag_tool factory in tools.py, extend MCPToolKit with rag_search_tools/audit_tools. Update function-apps.bicep for server #7.

title: Coverage Check Skill - CMS Depth Demo
description: Lightweight quick-demo skill using CMS MCP depth. Given a CPT code, ICD-10 codes, and state, calls check_medical_necessity, get_mac_jurisdiction, and get_coverage_by_cpt for an instant coverage determination. Showcases the full CMS Coverage MCP surface (5 tools) in a focused, easy-to-demo workflow.
